game.name: Jungle Rumble
game.shortDescription: Become a fearless soldier, face off against the evil Skull and his army in the heart of the Amazon jungle. Survive deadly traps, ambushes, and explosive battles to restore peace. Will you emerge victorious?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a fearless soldier, face off against the evil Skull and his army in the heart of the Amazon jungle. Survive deadly traps, ambushes, and explosive battles to restore peace. Will you emerge victorious?

reviewHighlights.text: Dynamic pixel action: shoot, explode, defeat bosses and feel like Rambo in the jungle. Simple, but incredibly exciting, I'm hooked!
